properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: GetFoldername
activities.description: Get the list of file

activities.name: ForEachFoldername
activities.description: Iterate each folder and find the folder or file inside it.

activities.name: FilterFolder
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.
